meta.description: Explore our weekly yoga class schedule in Mexico City. Find your perfect practice time.

hero.title: Our Classes
hero.subtitle: Find your Light and nourish your Soul with guidance of our expert teachers

intro.text: Join us for transformative yoga classes in CDMX! Each session is a unique experience - we offer various yoga styles and a team of amazing teachers to suit all needs. Whether you're a complete beginer or a long-time practitioner, you are welcome to join our family!

legend.title: Class Types
legend.subtitle: Each class type offers a unique experience

kundalini.name: Kundalini Yoga
kundalini.description: Embark on a transformative journey of self-discovery and spiritual growth through an intense practice focused on energy work

vinyasa.name: Vinyasa Yoga
vinyasa.description: Tap into your inner flow with dynamic sequences that improve circulation and help you regain grace and balance

hatha.name: Hatha Yoga
hatha.description: Build a strong foundation with a versatile yoga style with deep roots in tradition

aerial.name: Aerial Yoga
aerial.description: Unleash your body's potential with breathtaking aerial sequences performed in silk hammocks

pricing.title: Pricing & Packages
pricing.subtitle: The more you practice, the more you save! Choose the package that fits your yoga journey.
pricing.note: With our packages, you can attend regular classes with all of our teachers as shown in the schedule above. Packages are valid for one calendar month from purchase date. Unused classes do not roll over, so make sure to use them all!

cta.title: Ready to Begin?
cta.text: Contact us to learn more about our classes and upcoming events. For quick responses, it's best to drop us a message on WhatsApp - but you can also send us an email.
